RUSBoost SVM with Radial Basis Function Kernel

rus_boost_svm_rbf.Rd

RUSBoost SVM with Radial Basis Function Kernel

Usage

rus_boost_svm_rbf(
  mode = "unknown",
  engine = "ebmc",
  num_learners = NULL,
  imb_ratio = NULL
)

Arguments

mode

classification

engine

ebmc's rus which uses e1701's svm

num_learners

how many weak learners should be ensembled via boosting

imb_ratio

major-minor class imbalance ratio
